solution_line_template: Three times more wrinkles than three eyes is {wrinkles_per_eye}*{num_eyes}=<<{wrinkles_per_eye}*{num_eyes}={num_wrinkles}>>{num_wrinkles} wrinkles.
Seven times more spots than wrinkles is {spots_per_wrinkle}*{num_wrinkles}=<<{spots_per_wrinkle}*{num_wrinkles}={num_spots}>>{num_spots} spots.
Therefore, the combined number of spots and wrinkles on the lizard is {num_spots}+{num_wrinkles}=<<{num_spots}+{num_wrinkles}={combined_spots_wrinkles}>>{combined_spots_wrinkles} spots and wrinkles.
Thus, the lizard has {combined_spots_wrinkles}-{num_eyes}={fewer_eyes_than_combined} fewer eyes than spots and wrinkles
